languages.text: "Нет! Она должна быть здесь, не может не быть здесь! Прошу, дайте мне кое-что попробовать. Может быть, это бред, но это моя последняя надежда".

traits.locale_text: "Нет! Она должна быть здесь, не может не быть здесь! Прошу, дайте мне кое-что попробовать. Может быть это бред, но это моя последняя надежда."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."
languages.original_text: "Нет! Она должна быть здесь, не может не быть здесь! Прошу, дайте мне кое-что попробовать. Может быть, это бред, но это моя последняя надежда".

traits.locale_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “不！它肯定就在这里！它不可能不在这里！求你了，让我试试吧。或许我确实是在胡说八道，但这依然是我最后的希望。”
languages.original_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."

traits.locale_text: “不！它肯定就在这里！它不可能不在这里！求你了，让我试试吧。或许我确实是在胡说八道，但这依然是我最后的希望。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡No! ¡Tiene que estar aquí, no hay otra opción! Por favor, deje que intente una cosa. Puede que esté delirando, pero sigue siendo mi última esperanza».
languages.original_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."

traits.locale_text: «¡No! ¡Tiene que estar aquí, no hay otra opción! Por favor, deje que intente una cosa. Puede que esté delirando, pero sigue siendo mi última esperanza».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nein! Es muss hier sein, es kann nicht nicht hier sein! Bitte, lasst mich einfach etwas ausprobieren. Vielleicht habe ich Wahnvorstellungen, aber das ist trotzdem meine letzte Hoffnung."
languages.original_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Es muss hier sein, es kann nicht nicht hier sein! Bitte, lasst mich einfach etwas ausprobieren. Vielleicht habe ich Wahnvorstellungen, aber das ist trotzdem meine letzte Hoffnung."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ウソ、ここにあるはずよ！お願いだから、何かやらせて。妄想かもしれないけど、それでもあたいにとっては最後の希望なの」
languages.original_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."

traits.locale_text: 「ウソ、ここにあるはずよ！お願いだから、何かやらせて。妄想かもしれないけど、それでもあたいにとっては最後の希望なの」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Non ! Elle est forcément là, il ne peut en être autrement ! Je vous en prie, laissez-moi essayer quelque chose. Je suis peut-être folle, mais c'est mon dernier espoir. »
languages.original_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Elle est forcément là, il ne peut en être autrement ! Je vous en prie, laissez-moi essayer quelque chose. Je suis peut-être folle, mais c'est mon dernier espoir. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır! Burada olmalı, başka bir ihtimal yok! Ne olur bir şeyler yapmama izin ver. Belki hayal görüyorum ama bu benim son şansım."
languages.original_text: "No! It must be here, it can't not be here! Please, just let me try something. Maybe I am delusional, but it's still my last hope."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır! Burada olmalı, başka bir ihtimal yok! Lütfen, bir şeyler yapmama izin verin. Hayal görüyor olabilirim ama bu benim son şansım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
